All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Add_Gaussian_Noise
    TODO: Remove or bring up to standards!
    Delaunay_Demo
    This plugin runs the Harris corner detector on the current image, applies Delaunay triangulation to the N strongest corners and displays the result as a vector overlay in a new image.
    Demo_Perlin_2d
    This ImageJ plugin creates a new noise image using a 2D gradient noise generator.
    Demo_Perlin_3d
    This ImageJ plugin creates a new noise image using a 3D gradient noise generator.
    Demo_Perlin_Nd
    This ImageJ plugin creates a new noise image using a N-dim.
    Fourier_Descriptor_IrregularSampling
    This plugin demonstrates the use of the trigonometric method for calculating Fourier descriptors.
    Fourier_Descriptor_RegularSampling
    This plugin corresponds to the Fourier descriptor code example in the book's implementation section (Program 6.1 in UtICS Vol.
    KMeans_Quantization
    ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the KMeansClusteringQuantizer class.
    KMeans_Quantization_Apache
    ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the KMeansClusteringQuantizerApache class.
    Median_Cut_Quantization
    ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the MedianCutQuantizer class.
    Octree_Quantization
    ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the OctreeQuantizer class.
    Private_Ellipse_Superposition_Animation  
    Private_Ellipse_Superposition_AnimationStack
